page.title: 16CHURCHES
page.content: ST. JOHN BOSCO'S CHURCH WAS BUILT IN {1968 }BY THE PEOPLE OF THE {PARISH.}IT IS A CATHOLIC CHURCH.THE CHURCH HOLDS ALTOGETHER IN A WEEK {670 }PEOPLE.THE CHURCH WILL HOLD {1,000}PEOPLE SITTING AND {500} PEOPLE STANDING.THE CHURCH IS INVOLVED IN ACTIVITIES SUCH AS{CUBS AND {BROWNIES}etc.THE CHURCH OFTEN RAISES MONEY FOR CHARITY WHICH GOES TO A MISSION IN {LIBERIA.}THE CHURCH IS SPECIAL BECAUSE IT IS {FATHER BRIAN'S} FAVOURITE SAINT. THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND IN WOODLEY IS CALLED{ST. JOHNS}AND THE VICAR IS CALLED REVEREND{JOHN CONGDON.}THE CHURCH WAS BUILT IN {1875.}THERE IS {35,000 }PEOPLE IN THE{PARISH}BUT IT IS STILL GROWING.THE CHURCH IS OLDER THAN ANY OTHER CHURCH IN WOODLEY.THE { {PARISH}IS MIXED BETWEEN OLDER AND YOUNGER PEOPLE.THE CHURCH RAISES{ { Â£35,000 }A YEAR.
